data.title: Scene In Nevada: The Pledge
meta_keywords: the pledge movie filmed in reno
data.meta_description: The Pledge is a 2001 neo-noir mystery film about a Nevada homicide detective who pledges to find the killer of a murdered child. Learn more about where it was filmed in Nevada!
data.text:
The Pledge is a 2001 neo-noir mystery film directed by Sean Penn and featuring an ensemble cast starring Jack Nicholson, Aaron Eckhart, Helen Mirren, Robin Wright Penn, Vanessa Redgrave, Sam Shepard, Mickey Rourke, and Benicio del Toro. The film is based on the 1958 novella The Pledge: Requiem for the Detective Novel by Friedrich Dürrenmatt.

Jack Nicholson plays Jerry Black, a Nevada homicide detective who, on the night of his retirement, pledges to find the killer of a murdered child.

Watch the official trailer below:

“The Pledge (2001) Official Trailer – Jack Nicholson Movie HD” by Movieclips Classic Trailers

Where Was The Pledge Filmed in Nevada?

The opening scenes of The Pledge were filmed in Reno, NV.
